issue.title: Rule ressource manager should be mandatory
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

A user can affect the rule "ressource manager" to nobody. If he do it, the ressource is lost in space, nobody can delete or manage it. This rule should be mandatory.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Hello Thomas,

You are right... it was discussed yesterday here : #699 (see my last remark).
It's on the way to be corrected.

Question : we had the following discussion this morning with Yves. Should we put "mandatory" all the roles or just the "resource manager". We think it should be ALL.

Do you agree ?

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

I prefer close this feature as it's content is fully part of #699
Thanks
